@graph.name: Operational Analytics - Real-time Fleet Management Visualization - Route4Me
@graph.description: Track arrival times, time-on-site, fuel usage, revenue, and expenses with actionable dashboards. Establish business baselines and get real-time insights into driver activity for improved operational decision-making.
@graph.keywords: route optimization, fleet management, operational analytics, business intelligence, real-time tracking, GPS tracking, geofencing, arrival times, time-on-site, fuel usage, revenue tracking, expense management, actionable dashboards, fleet visibility, performance metrics

@graph.name: Operational Analytics for Fleet Management
@graph.description: Route4Me collects data and provides visualization tools to help improve your business. With GPS tracking and geofencing features, you can follow your drivers' progress in real-time. The system automatically records tracking data and other activities to create actionable dashboards. Route4Me records information about arrival times, time-on-site, fuel usage, revenue, and expenses, allowing you to establish baselines for your business. All route planning, fleet management, telematics, and operational analytics are unified in one integrated system.
